: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus layes Elita down in her crib.

Rodimus Prime: I'm sorry to leave you again, but I have to go see 
that mommy gets better.

Rodimus walks to Yggdrasil's position.

Rodimus Prime: Ok, let's undo what those Predacon scum did. After 
fixing any physical damage, we can upload the program you took from 
me, and that should restore our Nighlight.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Sorry for the handling, I'm trying to save time.
> 
> Yggdrasil: It might take some time, it all depends of how the Preds 
> worked. I'm glad we made that backup copy the other day though...
> 
> He walked up to the CR where Nightlight was kept and squarely 
turned 
> her offline. He then took her on a Data Table, laid her down then, 
> with a long wire, connected with her.
> 
> He first checked the state of the system and what the Preds had 
done 
> or destroyed...
> 
> (Airly, you tell me here!)
